resources.string: The game begins with a night phase.
"It is crucial that all actions by players at night be performed silently.
1. Moderator tells everyone to shut their eyes.
2. Moderator says, \"Developer Group Organizers, open your eyes.\"
3. Moderator, and Developer Group Organizers identify each other and close their eyes.
5. The Werewolves silently choose (point) who to attack.
6. The Moderator keeps note and then the Werewolves shut their eyes.
7. The Moderator says, \"Spy, open your eyes.\"
8. Keep note who it is. Spy closes their eyes.
9. The Moderator says, \"Hacker, open your eyes.\"
10. The Hacker choose who to identify.
11. The Moderator silently signals the identity. Hacker closes eyes.
12. The Moderator says, \"Spy, open your eyes.\"
13. The Spy choose who to identify.
14. The Moderator silently signals the identity. Spy closes eyes.
15. The Moderator says, \"Everyone open their eyes.\"
